package.name: italian-accents
package.author: Federico Terzi
package.description: Include Italian accents substitutions to espanso.
package.title: Italian Accents

manifest.author: Federico Terzi
manifest.description: Include Italian accents substitutions to espanso.
manifest.name: italian-accents
manifest.title: Italian Accents

value.readme:
A simple package to conveniently type italian with a non-italian keyboard layout.
It works by replacing keywords like `e'` with `è`. More details below.

### Installation

Install the package with:

```
espanso install italian-accents
```

### Usage

This package replaces the following keywords with the associated accent while you're typing:

#### Lowercase Accents

Keyword | Replaced
--- | ---
`e'` | è
`e//` | é
`i'` | ì
`a'` | à
`o'` | ò
`u'` | ù

#### Uppercase Accents

Keyword | Replaced
--- | ---
`E'` | È
`E//` | É

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Italian Accents package

matches:
  - trigger: "e'"
    replace: "è"
  - trigger: "e//"
    replace: "é"
  - trigger: "a'"
    replace: "à"
  - trigger: "i'"
    replace: "ì"
  - trigger: "o'"
    replace: "ò"
  - trigger: "u'"
    replace: "ù"

  # Capital accented letters
  - trigger: "E'"
    replace: "È"
  - trigger: "E//"
    replace: "É"
